Run DML-PLR with user-supplied recipes and parsnip models

run_dml.Rd

Run DML-PLR with user-supplied recipes and parsnip models

Usage

run_dml(
  data,
  output_recipe,
  treatment_recipe,
  output_model,
  treatment_model,
  folds_outer = NULL,
  n_folds = 5,
  vcov_type = "HC2"
)
